statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE website_id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 100 AND clicks > 10;
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE website_id = 100 AND page_views > 5000;
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE conversions < 10 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_engagement WHERE clicks > 20);

DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_url = '/home'
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 100 AND click_count > 5;
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND duration_seconds > 60;
